artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Trifold sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,407); at left in black and white is a metal basket with a cloth ribbon on the handle and a belt buckle with bows in metal at the top and the bottom; in the center is a man in yellow breeches, a pink and white striped coat, and a black hat and walking stick; on the right is a woman in a pink and white gown with a pink and white hat with white leaves sprouting from the top
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashion plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Dix-neuvième Cahier, 1 Juin 1789
